com.k2.Util

Class BooleanUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.BooleanUtil

  • public class BooleanUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility provides static method for handling Boolean values.
    Author:
    simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BooleanUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Integer falseAsInt()
      This method returns the current value that is used to represent the value false as an integer
      static void falseAsInt(int value)
      This method defines the value that is used to represent a false value as an integer The default value is '0'
      static java.lang.String falseAsString()
      This method returns the current value that is used to represent the value false as a String
      static void falseAsString(java.lang.String value)
      This method defines the value that is used to represent a false value as a String The default value is 'false'
      static java.lang.Boolean nvl(java.lang.Boolean checkValue, java.lang.Boolean valueIfNull)
      This method converts null values
      static java.lang.Boolean randomBoolean()
      This method returns a random Boolean value
      static void registerTypeConverter(TypeConverter<?,java.lang.Boolean> converter)
      This method registers with this static utility an instance of a boolean TypeConverter to convert an instance of the convertible class into a boolean value
      static void restoreDefaults()
      This method restores the default settings of the BooleanUtil
      static java.lang.Boolean toBoolean(java.lang.Object v)
      This method converts the given object into a Boolean value Static utility methods convert Strings, Integers, Longs, Floats, Doubles, Dates and Booleans into Boolean values If the given object is not one of the above types then a type converter must have been registered with this static utility in order for the given object to be converted into a boolean value If no type converter has been registered for the class of the given object then a null is returned

      • registerTypeConverter

        public static void registerTypeConverter(TypeConverter<?,java.lang.Boolean> converter)
        This method registers with this static utility an instance of a boolean TypeConverter to convert an instance of the convertible class into a boolean value
        Parameters:
        converter - The boolean TypeConverter instance

      • toBoolean

        public static java.lang.Boolean toBoolean(java.lang.Object v)
        This method converts the given object into a Boolean value Static utility methods convert Strings, Integers, Longs, Floats, Doubles, Dates and Booleans into Boolean values If the given object is not one of the above types then a type converter must have been registered with this static utility in order for the given object to be converted into a boolean value If no type converter has been registered for the class of the given object then a null is returned
        Parameters:
        v - The object to convert into a Boolean value
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of the given object or null if the given object is null or the class of the given object cannot be converted into a boolean value

      • toDate

        public static java.util.Date toDate(java.lang.Boolean v)
        This method converts the given boolean value into a Data
        Parameters:
        v - The boolean value to convert
        Returns:
        The date representing the given boolean value. If the given boolean value is false then the epoch is returned. If the given boolean value is true then the system current date is returned. If the given boolean value is null then null is returned.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Boolean v)
        This method converts the given boolean value into a String
        Parameters:
        v - The boolean value to convert
        Returns:
        A string representing the given boolean value

      • randomBoolean

        public static java.lang.Boolean randomBoolean()
        This method returns a random Boolean value
        Returns:
        A random Boolean value

      • nvl

        public static java.lang.Boolean nvl(java.lang.Boolean checkValue,
                                    java.lang.Boolean valueIfNull)
        This method converts null values
        Parameters:
        checkValue - The value to check for null
        valueIfNull - The value to return if the value to check is null
        Returns:
        The checkValue if it is not null else the valueIfNull
